name: Jolly Volley
description:
A simple 2D Volleyball game made for the Summer 2014 GIJam at UW.

Uses 2 game pads.

  • LS - Move/Aim hits
  • A - Jump
  • B - Swing/Hit ball (Hold to get a powerful swing)
  • Esc - Quit game
  • R - Restart Game

* can be configured to be played on keyboard as well.

Update (06/21/2014)

  • Fixed end of game bug where player's maintained their last velocity.
  • Fixed being able to get stuck on the other player's head.
  • Fixed player shadows appearing in front of walls.
  • Tweaked stuff...
